Future Past Present Simple Continuous Perfect Perfect Continuous

Future Simple

  1. I will work
  2. He won't work
  3. Will he work?
  1. will

Future Continuous

  1. I will be working
  2. He won't be working
  3. Will they be working?
  1. will be + ing

Future Perfect

  1. I will have worked
  2. He won't have worked
  3. Have they worked?
  1. will have + (work)ed

Future Perfect Continuous

  1. I will have been working
  2. He won't have been working
  3. Will they have been working?
  1. will have been + ing

Past Simple

  1. I worked
  2. He didn't work
  3. Did you work?
  1. did

Past Continuous

  1. I was working
  2. He were working
  3. He wasn't working
  4. We aren't working
  5. Is he working?
  6. Are we working?
  1. was + ing
  2. were + ing

Past Perfect

  1. I had worked
  2. He hadn't worked
  3. Had they worked?
  1. had + (work)ed

Past Perfect Continuous

  1. I had been working
  2. He hadn't been working
  3. Had they been working?
  1. had been + ing

Present Simple

  1. I work
  2. He works
  3. I don't work
  4. He doesn't work
  5. Do you work?
  6. Does he work?
  1. do
  2. does

Present Continuous

  1. I am working
  2. He is working
  3. We are working
  4. I'm not working
  5. He isn't working
  6. We aren't working
  7. Am I working?
  8. Is he working?
  9. Are we working?
  1. am + ing
  2. is + ing
  3. are + ing

Present Perfect

  1. I have worked
  2. He was worked
  3. I haven't worked
  4. He hasn't worked
  5. Have you worked?
  6. Has he worked?
  1. have + (work)ed
  2. has + (work)ed

Present Perfect Continuous

  1. I have been working
  2. He has been working
  3. I haven't been working
  4. He hasn't been working
  5. Have you been working?
  6. Has he been working?
  1. have been + ing
  2. has been + ing
